translation: The proud warriors Sumbh and Nisumbh were born.
They planned to conquer the capital of Indra.21.

gurmukhi: ੲਿੰਦ੍ਰਪੁਰੀ ਤੇ ਧਾਵਣਾ; ਵਡ ਜੋਧੀ ਮਤਾ ਪਕਾੲਿਅਾ ||
translation: The great fighters decided to rush towards the kingdom of Indra.

gurmukhi: ਸੰਜ ਪਟੇਲਾ ਪਾਖਰਾ; ਭੇੜ ਸੰਦਾ ਸਾਜ ਬਣਾੲਿਅਾ ||
transliteration: Sanj Patelaa Paakharaa Bhed Sandaa Saaj(u) Banaaiaa||
translation: They began to prepare the war-material consisting of armour with belts and saddle-gear.

gurmukhi: ਜੰਮੇ ਕਟਕ ਅਛੂਹਣੀ; ਅਸਮਾਨੁ ਗਰਦੀ ਛਾੲਿਅਾ ||
translation: An army of lakhs of warriors gathered and the dust rose to sky.
Sumbh and Nisumbh, full of rage, have marched forward.22.

gurmukhi: ਸੰੁਭ ਨਿਸੰੁਭ ਅਲਾੲਿਅਾ; ਵਡ ਜੋਧੀ ਸੰਘਰ ਵਾੲੇ ||
transliteration: Sounbh Nisounbh Alaaiaa Vad Jodhisanhar(u) Vaae||
translation: Sumbh and Nisumbh ordered the great warriors to sound the bugle of war.

gurmukhi: ਰੋਹ ਦਿਖਾਲੀ ਦਿੱਤੀਅਾ; ਵਰਿਅਾਮੀ ਤੁਰੇ ਨਚਾੲੇ ||
translation: Great fury was visulised and the brave fighters caused the horses to dance.

gurmukhi: ਘੁਰੇ ਦਮਾਮੇ ਦੋਹਰੇ; ਜਮ ਬਾਹਣ ਜਿੳੁ ਅਰੜਾੲੇ ||
transliteration: Ghure Damaame Dodare Jam Baahan Jio Ar-daae||
translation: The double-trumpets sounded like the loud voice of the male buffalo, the vehicle of Yama.
The gods and demons have gathered to fight.23.
The demons and gods have started a continuous war.

gurmukhi: ਫੁੱਲ ਖਿੜੇ ਜਣ ਬਾਗੀ; ਬਾਣੇ ਜੋਧਿਅਾ ||
transliteration: Phull Khide Jan Baageen Baane Jodhiaan||
translation: The garments of the warriors appear like flowers in the garden.
